descriptionHtml:
NOTE: I am no longer maintaining this mod. Please see http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27755/ for MShoap13\'s updated version.

Adds 42 natural and 20 dyed hair colors to the game. Will probably not work with other race modification mods, even those that don\'t affect hair color.

The natural colors come in 7 hues: 2 reddish, 3 blondish, and 2 brownish. Each hue has 6 brightnesses. The dyed colors are red, yellow, green, teal, blue, and magenta; each of these has 3 brightnesses. There are also a white and black.

Will not work with other race modification mods (even those that don\'t change hair color). Sorry! Tell your mod authors to merge the mods, or check out the hair color tutorial at http://www.creationkit.com/ColorForm#Adding_Hair_Colors .

9 April 2012: Fixed one of the colors that was slightly off. Thanks droarc!


17 March 2012: Brighter pure white.

14 February 2012: Added dyed hair colors. I think hair colors are not randomized after all?

Example (credit: droarc):
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14713-1-1333933741.png[/img]
author: Evil4Zerggin
